targets.query: SELECT last("ip") AS "Address", last("note") AS "Note", last("network") AS "Network" FROM "clients" WHERE ("is_wired" = 'false' AND "ap_mac" =~ /^$AP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac", "oui", "channel", "radio", "name", "ap_mac"

SELECT last("ip") AS "Address", last("note") AS "Note", last("network") AS "Network" FROM "clients" WHERE ("is_wired" != 'false' AND "name" =~ /^$Client$/ AND "site_name" =~ /$Site$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "sw_port", "mac", "oui", "use_fixedip", "name"
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE time > now() - 10m AND is_wired = 'true' AND "site_name" =~ /$Site$/ group by hostname
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE time > now() - 10m AND (is_wired != 'true' AND "site_name" =~ /$Site$/ AND "ap_mac" =~ /^$AP$/ AND "name" =~ /^$Client$/) group by channel
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 10m AND ap_mac =~ /$AP$/ AND "site_name" =~ /$Site$/ and  "name" =~ /^$Client$/) group by radio_proto, radio, radio_name, ap_mac
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 60m AND "name" =~ /^$Client$/ AND "ap_mac" =~ /^$AP$/ and site_name =~ /$Site$/ and "name" =~ /^$Client$/) group by oui
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 60m  AND "is_wired" = 'true' and site_name =~ /$Site$/) group by oui

select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 10m AND "ap_mac" =~ /^$AP$/ AND "name" =~ /^$Client$/ AND "site_name" =~ /$Site$/) group by os_class, os_name, dev_cat, dev_family, dev_id

panels.description: Bandwidth usage per wireless devices as reported by the UAPs. Does not include amazon devices.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: UAP Bandwidth / Wireless Devices

panels.description: Cameras TX / RX bytes per second (calculated in 1 minute buckets).

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: Switch Bandwidth / Cameras

panels.description: Amazon Devices TX / RX bytes per second (calculated in 30 second buckets).

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: Switch Bandwidth / Echos & FireTVs

panels.description: Wired TX / RX bytes per second (calculated in 30 second buckets). Does not include amazon and camera devices. Unaffected by the AP setting.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: Switch Bandwidth / Wired Devices

panels.description: Shows which wireless radio a client is connected to. Setting AP does not change this.
panels.title: Wifi Client / AP

panels.description: Shows IPs assigned to non-static clients.
panels.title: Client / IP

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
